entry.title: cuteNfuzzy Easy Feed Small Pet Hanging Hay Bag for Guinea Pigs and Rabbits
entry.summary:
Vendor: cuteNfuzzy
Type: Small Animal Supplies
Price: 18.95

CuteNfuzzy's line of small pet hay feeders first premiered in 2019 and were meticulously designed and tested here in the USA. We're proud to have created a line of attractive, high-quality, innovative, long-lasting, and best-selling hay feeders designed for use with any small animal such as guinea pigs, rabbits, chinchillas, degus, and even reptiles such as tortoises! These bags are designed for easy, hassle-free, waste-free, and mess-free hay feeding. Unlike traditional wooden, plastic, or metal hay feeders that are intrusive, heavy, hard to fill, and can become dangerous for your pet, our feeders are completely safe and easy to use.

Each of our small pet hay bags features a pair of high-quality stainless steel trigger snaps that make hanging this bag a breeze, as well as a d-ring on the back so you can anchor the bag to your cage wall to prevent your pet from moving or flipping it. Our bags also have a full velcro closing top to prevent hay spillage. You'll love how much less hay is wasted and how much cleaner your pet's cage stays with our hay bags! Our feeders were designed to be as hygienic as possible by keeping your hay dry and unsoiled. These bags are also easy to clean and feature a waterproof inner lining. All of the seams on these bags are sturdily reinforced for maximum longevity.

Small animals have teeth that never stop growing, so they need to constantly chew in order to keep their teeth from becoming overgrown. Some pets are heavier chewers than others, and while most will not chew fabric, some pets may shred, rip, or eat fabric. For the pets who do this, we do not recommend the use of a fabric hay bag for them as they could try to ingest the fabric. Please take your pet’s individual personality, needs, and safety into consideration when choosing a hay feeder for them. We recommend keeping your hay bag full and not letting it become empty for lengths of time in order to lessen the risk of them eating the fabric. If your hay bag becomes damaged, immediately discontinue using it.

  • DESIGNED WITH YOUR PETS SAFETY IN MIND - this hay bag features an all-fabric durable nylon web design with 1.25" x 2" openings for increased safety, comfort for your pet, and durability. Our hay bags were proudly designed in the USA and tested extensively.
  • PERFECT FOR GUINEA PIGS, RABBITS, CHINCHILLAS, AND MORE - these hay bags were designed for use with a wide variety of hay eating small animals. Our hay bags are sized to hold a generous amount of hay, and are safe for every day and long-term use.
  • NOT DESIGNED FOR HEAVY CHEWERS - some small pets will chew/eat fabric. For these pets, we recommend that you do not use a fabric hay feeder as they may try to ingest the fabric. Always monitor your pet and remove the hay bag if it becomes damaged.
  • EXCLUSIVE SUPER TOUGH BOTTOM DESIGN - originally designed for horses, this bottom is more durable and keeps hay fresher by providing better air flow and allowing dust to exit your pet's hay. This also makes accessing the hay easier for your pet.
  • AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE SIZES AND COLORS - this hay pouch is available in two sizes: Small (10" long x 11" tall x 3” wide) and Large (15" long x 11" tall x 3” wide), and the colors Black, Hurricane Blue, Pink, and Dark Purple to best suit you and your pet's needs!

entry.title: Weaver Livestock Poly Rope Sheep Halter with Snap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Livestock
Price: 8.95

This fully-adjustable 3/8" poly rope sheep halter is made from traditional "parachute" rope, the same rope traditionally used to construct equine rope halters. This style adjusts easily on the animal and features a snap with a shorter lead that allows you to quickly secure your animal in a pen or wash rack. A great value, this halter comes in a cool selection of color combinations. Measures 52" long with the headpiece condensed.

entry.title: Derby Midnight All Black Premium Flat Fancy Stitch Leather Cattle Show Halter with Matching Chain Lead - One Year Limited Manufacturer’s Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Cattle
Price: 42.99

Derby Originals’ line of leather cattle show halters was designed to look elegant, remain beautiful for many years to come, and help to show off and complement the beauty of your cow or steer without detracting from the animal itself. These cattle show halters are available in many styles and a variety of colors and sizes designed to suit every breed of cow and every life stage. If you’re looking for an attractive, high-quality, elegant show halter at an amazing price, look no further! These new and improved cattle show halters were released in 2019 and feature new and improved sizing, and one year limited manufacturer’s warranties.

 

Features

NEW ALL BLACK DESIGN - this elegant Black Midnight cattle halter is our first show halter featuring an all black construction with black leather and hardware for a rich, elegant look that is sure to complement any cow.

AVAILABLE IN THREE SIZES - this leather halter is available in three sizes, Small, Medium, and Large.

INCLUDES MATCHING CHAIN LEAD - each of our Derby Originals leather show halters includes a matching 1” wide 48” leather lead with a 14” heavy-duty nickel plated control chain.

PERFECT FOR FAIR AND SHOWS – our Derby Originals leather show halters were designed for events from local fairs to the professional show ring. These halters have a high-class design and are built to last. These halters are great for 4H-ers!

ONE YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY - we’re proud to be the first company to offer one year warranties on our new cattle show halters. Visit https://www.derbyoriginals.com/pages/warranty-registration-1 for more information.

 

Size Chart

Small (350 lbs - 700 lbs)
Crown: 12" - 16"
Cheekpiece: 6"
Noseband: 9"

Medium (650 lbs - 1050 lbs)
Crown: 14" - 20"
Cheekpiece: 7"
Noseband: 10"

Large (950 lbs - 1500 lbs)
Crown: 16" - 22"
Cheekpiece: 8"
Noseband: 11"

entry.title: Weaver Livestock Pro Calf Blanket, Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Livestock
Price: 36.95

Keep your calf warm with these water-resistant blankets constructed of 900-denier material with a single layer 200-gram polyester fiber fill. Blanket doesn't hold moisture in against calf and features adjustable belly straps with quick-release buckles for easy on and off. Machine washable

entry.title: Weaver Leather ProCool™ Mesh Sheep Blanket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Livestock
Price: 34.95

An industry first, this unique blanket with breathable white mesh material provides excellent ventilation and blocks 98% of UVA/UVB rays, making it great for slick shorn lambs. The durable, rip-resistant material offers effective protection from fly bites and provides a barrier against fungus while keeping the animal clean and cool. Edged with black binding for added strength, these blankets also feature snap and ring ends on the adjustable belly strap that rest inside pockets to help protect the lamb from rubbing or chafing. A mesh butt provides added air circulation while leg gussets allow for extended leg movement. Machine wash separately in cold water, gentle cycle; line dry only; do not bleach. Small fits lambs 80-120 lbs.

entry.title: Weaver Leather Pig Whip/Dressage Whip
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Livestock
Price: 11.95

In exciting colors kids will love, this pig whip is quality constructed for maximum durability. A comfortable rubber handle provides extra grip. Measures 36" overall including popper.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Cattle
Price: 47.99

Derby Originals’ line of leather cattle show halters was designed to look elegant, remain beautiful for many years to come, and help to show off and complement the beauty of your cow or steer without detracting from the animal itself. These cattle show halters are available in many styles and a variety of colors and sizes designed to suit every breed of cow and every life stage. If you’re looking for an attractive, high-quality, elegant show halter at an amazing price, look no further! These new and improved cattle show halters were released in 2019 and feature new and improved sizing, and one-year limited manufacturer’s warranties.

 

Features

PREMIUM LEATHER CONSTRUCTION - this elegant show halter features a solid premium-leather construction, with flexible, supple padded raised leather on the nose and cheeks, an adjustable flat leather crown, and sturdy leather stays to keep the halter’s shape in the ring.

AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE SIZES AND COLORS - this leather halter is available in the sizes Small, Medium, and Large and in two leather colors to best suit your taste and the color of your animal: deep Black and rich Havana.

INCLUDES MATCHING CHAIN LEAD - each of our Derby Originals leather show halters includes a matching 1” wide 48” leather lead with a 14” heavy-duty nickel-plated control chain.

PERFECT FOR FAIR AND SHOWS – our Derby Originals leather show halters were designed for events from local fairs to the professional show ring. These halters have a high-class design and are built to last. These halters are great for 4H-ers!

ONE YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY - we’re proud to be the first company to offer one-year warranties on our new cattle show halters. Visit https://www.derbyoriginals.com/pages/warranty-registration-1 for more information.

 

Size Chart

Crown: 12" - 16"
Cheekpiece: 6"
Noseband: 9"

Medium (650 lbs - 1050 lbs)
Crown: 14" - 20"
Cheekpiece: 7"
Noseband: 10"

Large (950 lbs - 1500 lbs)
Crown: 16" - 22"
Cheekpiece: 8"
Noseband: 11"

entry.title: Livestock Adjustable Poly Neck Rope
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Livestock
Price: 9.95

  • Made from twisted, tight weave polypropylene, this neck rope features a slide adjustment to easily fit any neck size
  • A braided snap end offers added strength
  • Brass plated hardware
  • Measures 1/2" x 10"

entry.title: Stierwalt Breaking Halter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Livestock
Price: 9.95

Great for halter breaking young cattle. The quick pull-and-release action helps to prevent swollen jaws during training. The pressure points and easy slide action work together to acclimate calves to the feel of a show halter with a chain.
  • Special figure eight hardware designed by Kirk Stierwalt makes this halter one of a kind
  • Quick pull-and-release action helps prevent swollen jaws, unlike the slower release of conventional breaking halters
  • Pressure points and easy slide action help acclimate calf to the feel of a show halter
  • Leads measure approximately 8-1/2' long
